content: here is the free pattern written on video only required yarn 4 ply yarn 2 2 mm size required hook 2 5 mm เข็มทองเบอร์ 4 you might use specific yarn size and hook to get the airpod case that fits i recommended 100% cotton yarn if you crochet it try to measure the height of both body part and lid part in case you don t use the exactly same size of yarn as i did body height 4 5-4 6 c m lid height 2 1- 2 2 c m i wrote the time in the description box under the video in case you might want to skip to the specific parts pattern details i use the same base body and lid for every design duck components body lid feet beak wings mallard same body lid feet wing as duck but beak is different penguin same body lid feet wing as duck same beak as mallard additional eyes and tummy bear same body lid as duck additional muzzle and ears rabbit same body lid as duck same muzzle as bear additional ears eye size are different using black beads duck 4 mm mallard 5 mm penguin 5 mm bear and rabbit 6 mm i hope you enjoy also please subscribe to my youtube channel i also put lots of effort to design the pattern and make video tutorials please help supporting me by subscribing watching my video and sharing it to your friends also i have instagram please follow https //www instagram com/crocketcrochet/ hl=en
